mapper.select: SELECT gameNo, gameName, gameImage, gamePrice, gameContent, gameContent, gameGenre, CONCAT('(',DATE_FORMAT(gameReleasedDate,'%Y'),')') as gameReleasedDate, gameCategory FROM game ORDER BY gameReleasedDate DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT gameNo, gameName, gameImage, gamePrice, gameContent, gameContent, gameGenre, CONCAT('(',DATE_FORMAT(gameReleasedDate,'%Y'),')') as gameReleasedDate, gameCategory FROM game WHERE discountRate != 0 ORDER BY gameReleasedDate DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT game.gameNo, game.gameName, game.gameImage, game.gamePrice, game.gameContent, game.gameContent, game.gameGenre, CONCAT('(',DATE_FORMAT(gameReleasedDate,'%Y'),')') as gameReleasedDate, game.gameCategory FROM game, rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo ORDER BY (rate.gameScore / rate.rateCount) DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT game.gameNo, game.gameName, game.gameImage, game.gamePrice, game.gameContent, game.gameContent, game.gameGenre, CONCAT('(',DATE_FORMAT(gameReleasedDate,'%Y'),')') as gameReleasedDate, game.gameCategory FROM game, rate, member WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo AND game.gameGenre REGEXP(IFNULL(REPLACE(member.mbrGenre, ',', '|'), '*')) AND member.mbrId = #{mbrId} ORDER BY rate.gameScore DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM game USE INDEX (game_category),rate WHERE game.gameNo = rate.gameNo AND game.gameNo != #{gameNo} AND game.gameCategory = #{gameCategory} ORDER BY rate.gameScore DESC, game.gameReleasedDate DESC LIMIT 5
